title: WeWow Earth Week Day 4: Cleaning Up!
description:
Welcome back to WeWow's Earth Week! Today, Mindy and Guy are picking up some trash and helping keep our Earth nice and clean! Then, we're going to listen to an episode of Flip and Mozi's Guide to How to be an Earthling all about animals sense of smell! Stay tuned tomorrow for our final day of Earth Week.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
